value.title: SoftBank's Son expects mass production of driverless cars in 2 years
value.excerpt: SoftBank Group Corp Chief Executive Masayoshi Son said on Friday he expects mass production of self-driving vehicles to start in two years.

value.title: Baidu gets California nod for testing empty self-driving cars
value.excerpt: Baidu Inc has received a permit from the state of California to test self-driving cars without a driver behind the wheel, the state's Department of Motor Vehicles said on Wednesday.

value.title: BlackBerry will power Baidu technology for future Chinese EVs
value.excerpt: BlackBerry may not be the stalwart it once was with phones, but its ties continue to deepen in the automotive realm.

value.title: Aeva to supply lidar sensors to self-driving truck firm TuSimple
value.excerpt: Aeva Inc, a firm founded by former Apple Inc engineers to supply a key self-driving car sensor, said on Tuesday it had reached a deal to supply the sensors for self-driving heavy duty trucks being developed by TuSimple.

value.title: This AI Could Go From ‘Art’ to Steering a Self-Driving Car
value.excerpt: DALL-E drew laughs for creating images of a daikon radish in a tutu. But it builds on an important advance in computer vision with serious applications.

value.title: Chinese electric carmaker Xpeng rolls out autonomous highway driving features in challenge to Tesla
value.excerpt: Xpeng Motors' Navigation Guided Pilot or NGP is rolling out to eligible customers of its P7 sedan in a challenge to Tesla's own software.

value.title: Elon Musk fires back at Waymo's CEO after he said Tesla was 'no competitor at all'
value.excerpt: Earlier this year, Waymo dropped "self-driving" from its vocabulary, saying "some automakers use the term in an inaccurate way."

value.title: Tesla partners with Samsung on new 5nm chip for full self-driving, report says
value.excerpt: Tesla has reportedly partnered with Samsung on a new 5nm chip for full self-driving, according to a new report coming from Korea. Tesla moves to design its own chips Back in 2016, Tesla started building a team of chip architects led by legendary chip designer Jim Keller to develop its own silicon.

value.title: The Most Important Voice In Artificial Intelligence: Frontline Workers
value.excerpt: Success with AI is going to be a bumpy and uneven road, and is going to need more human knowledge and input than we can ever imagine.

value.title: Competing in the Age of AI
value.excerpt: Spun out of Alibaba, Ant Financial uses artificial intelligence and data from Alipay ... products (like Amazon’s warehouse robots or Waymo, Google’s self-driving car service).

value.title: Self-Driving Cars Being Blocked By Human Drivers Using Road Bouldering Tactics
value.excerpt: Human drivers use road bouldering to block other cars, and the question arises as to how self-driving cars will handle such machinations.

value.title: The real self-driving revolution remains years away
value.excerpt: This year, new technologies will enable more drivers to take their hands off the wheel while on the road. But that doesn't mean their cars will be fully self-driving -- that day still remains far in the future.

value.title: Trump pardons former Google self-driving car engineer Anthony Levandowski
value.excerpt: Donald Trump has given a full pardon to Anthony Levandowski, a former Google engineer who stole trade secret on self-driving cars.Read MoreRead

value.title: Trump pardons Anthony Levandowski, the engineer who stole self-driving car secrets from Google
value.excerpt: Tech billionaire Peter Thiel — previously one of Trump's top allies in Silicon Valley — was among those the White House listed as supporters of Levandowski's pardon.

value.title: GM and Cruise lend a hand to Honda's self-driving mobility service
value.excerpt: Honda is in for a little help from General Motors and Cruise Automation. On Wednesday, the Japanese automaker said GM and Cruise Automation will help its upcoming self-driving mobility service in Japan.

value.title: Trump pardons former Google self-driving car engineer Levandowski
value.excerpt: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday he had given a full pardon to a former Google engineer sentenced for stealing a trade secret on self-driving cars months before he briefly headed Uber Technologies Inc's rival unit.

value.title: Here's Why Investors Should Pay Close Attention to Artificial Intelligence
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence is ingrained into our lives. It’s influencing our shopping choices online, helping us book meetings, and even finding the best deals. The auto industry is using AI to create driverless cars.

value.title: Self-driving startup Aurora partners with heavy truck company Paccar
value.excerpt: Aurora -- a company probably best known for buying up Uber's ill-fated self-driving vehicle division -- is hard at work trying to bring autonomy to the world of trucking. To facilitate this, Aurora announced its partnership with Paccar (maker of Peterbilt and Kenworth trucks) on Tuesday.

value.title: Cruise, GM partner with Microsoft to ramp up self-driving vehicles
value.excerpt: Self-driving car maker Cruise and majority shareholder General Motors Co said on Tuesday they would partner with Microsoft Corp to accelerate the commercialization of driverless vehicles.

value.title: Microsoft Teaming With GM to Bring Driverless Cars Into ‘Mainstream’

value.title: DJI to hire engineers to work on self-driving technology
